docs.title: Resources map
docs.text:
VPN-only - means it is wokring only under VPN, learn how to configure in VPN section

  • defguard, VPN/SSO manager
  • pgAdmin4 (VPN-only)
  • PostgreSQL DB on pg.pineapple.pp.ua (VPN-only)

docs.title: Onboarding new user
docs.text:
1. Login to defguard as admin
  2. Navigate to users tab
  3. Click "Add new"
  4. Fill all needed fields , use @pineapple.pp.ua as subdomain for email
  5. Provide login/password to user

docs.title: Wireguard install on Windows
docs.text:
1. Install wireguard from https://download.wireguard.com/windows-client/
  2. Configure client using Configuring Wireguard client

docs.title: Wireguard install on macOS
docs.text:
1. Install wireguard from AppStore
  2. Configure client using Configuring Wireguard client

docs.title: Configuring Wireguard client
docs.text:
1. Login to defguard with your credentials
  2. Tap add new device
  3. Choose name for your device and pick "Generate key pair" option. Each device must have its own config!
  4. Save configuration to file
  5. Import it in wireguard (example for macOS)
  6. Activate new connection and check if you can access any private resource

docs.title: Password change
docs.text:
1. Login to defguard with your credentials
  2. Tap "Edit profile"
  3. Tap "Change password"
